column4: Hi folks... i have a question, a week ago i bought me a USB bluetooth dongle , i plug it in and paid my mobile and i was able to browse the internet through my phone internet just fine (Thrething) ...i was trying to fix my gnome applet today ...it is still not fixed and i lost the ability to browse the INTERNET thru my phone. i can still see and browse my phone over the Bluetooth just not...
try disabling and reenabling bluetooth on the phone
i assume you are using enable dialup networking on the bluetooth phone and then select the broadband provider?
